Html:
I recently followed this excellent Tutorial. I converted the code to vb.net as I went, so thought I would upload it to my site converted source code for any other vb.net programmers out there.

http://philhey.co.uk/Article/Details/VB_Net_MVC_NerdDinner_Source_Code

Hope this is OK

Its built with Visual Studio 2010, but will work fine with dotnet 3.5 if you import the files into a new project.

Great!
